title: Fragment Of Maniple Or Stole, 16th–17th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: supplementary warp forming raised pile (velvet); then embossed
provenance: ex. coll. Antonio Vivès y Escudero
description: Fragment embossed with a quatrefoil pattern. a 'ghost' outline of a cross that was once present on the fabric.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment Of Maniple Or Stole, 16th–17th century.
16th–17th century. Medium: silk
Technique: supplementary warp forming raised pile (velvet); then embossed. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-514.
